description: Gathering and validating technical specifications, performance criteria, and regulatory standards for the LiDAR camera set.
Developing mechanical, optical, and electronic designs, followed by prototype creation and iterative testing.
Sourcing materials, fabricating components, and assembling the LiDAR system with quality control checks.
Conducting functional, environmental, and durability tests, and calibrating sensors for accuracy.
Installing the LiDAR system in the target environment, integrating with existing infrastructure, and validating performance.
Monitoring system performance, performing routine maintenance, and addressing operational issues.
Safely dismantling the system, disposing of hazardous materials, and recycling reusable components.
